timeline.message: Text changes, dates formatting & update to placeholder branding.
Text changes, dates formatting & update to placeholder branding.

timeline.author: zohrehj
zohrehj

timeline.bodyText: Should this be a variable that can be easily changes across the whole app?
timeline.author: zohrehj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -278,7 +275,7 @@ class StudyListViewController: UIViewController {
 
       if daysLastSeen >= 7 {  // Notification is disabled for 7 or more Days
         UIUtilities.showAlertWithTitleAndMessage(
-          title: NSLocalizedString("FDA MyStudies", comment: "") as NSString,
+          title: NSLocalizedString("App Name", comment: "") as NSString,

replies.bodyText: Not sure why FDA MyStudies was changed to appName. I think FDA MyStudies or simply MyStudies would be a better placeholder text than app name
replies.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText:
This is part of branding changes and will be picked from there.
Seems like we missed to link this here. I've linked this to the branding file now.

timeline.bodyText: why was this changed? I  think as scheduled is a better term.

timeline.bodyText: please remove lorem ipsum. It's preferable to leave it empty than this.
